summary: Delegates will be treated to flavours such as maniçoba, açaí and pirarucu prepared with more than 10 tonnes of agroecological ingredients . Indigenous chef and activist Tainá Marajoara will serve dishes rooted in ancestral Amazonian traditions, showcasing the biodiversity and spirituality of Brazil’s Indigenous Peoples .
